src:
Klasemen Serie A Pekan 11: Juventus dan Inter Milan Menang
02 Nov 2019, 22:29 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Juventus dan Inter Milan sama-sama berhasil meraih kemenangan dalam rangkaian pertandingan Serie A Liga Italia pekan ke-11, Ahad dinihari WIB, 3 November 2019. Juventus menang 1-0 di kandang Torino, sedangkan Inter Milan mengalahkan tuan rumah Bologna 2-1.
Juventus tampil mengandalkan Cristiano Ronaldo pada laga di kandang Torino, Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. Mereka sempat kesulitan membobol ketatnya pertahan lawan. Si Nyonya Tua baru bisa menjebol gawang lawan pada menit ke-70 lewat gol Matthijs De Ligt.
Hasil ini memastikan Juve tetap memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 29 dari 11 laga. Mereka unggul satu poin dari Inter Milan.
Inter sendiri berhasil membawa pulang tiga poin dan menang 2-1 saat bertandang ke markas Bologna. I Nerazurri tertinggal lebih dahulu oleh gol Roberto Sorian, tapi kemudian unggul berkat dua gol Romelu Lukaku.
Pada laga lain, AS Roma mengalahkan Napoli 2-1. Gol Roma dicetak Nicolo Zaniolo dan Jordan Veretout (penalti), sedangkan gol Napoli diceploskan Arek Milik.
Roma kini naik ke posisi ketiga klasemen dengan nilai 22, sedangkan Napoli berada di urutan keenam dengan nilai 18.
Hasil Liga Italia pekan ke-11Roma 2 - 1 NapoliBologna 1 - 2 InterTorino 0 - 1 Juventus.

text:
Serie A Standings Week 11: Juventus and Inter Milan Win
02 Nov 2019, 22:29 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Juventus and Inter Milan both won in the series of Serie A matches in Week 11, Sunday morning WIB, 3 November 2019. Juventus won 1-0 at Torino, while Inter Milan defeated the hosts Bologna home 2-1.
Juventus appear to rely on Cristiano Ronaldo in the match at home to Torino, the Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. They had difficulty breaking into the tight defense of the opponent. The Old Lady can only break through the opponent's goal in the 70th minute through goals from Matthijs De Ligt.
These results ensure Juve still topped the standings with a value of 29 from 11 matches. They are one point ahead of Inter Milan.
Inter itself managed to bring home three points and won 2-1 when they travel to Bologna headquarters. I Nerazurri was left behind by Roberto Sorian's goal, but then went ahead thanks to Romelu Lukaku's two goals.
In another match, AS Roma beat Napoli 2-1. Rome's goals were printed by Nicolo Zaniolo and Jordan Veretout (penalty), while Napoli's goal was struck by Arek Milik.
Rome is now up to third place standings with a value of 22, while Naples is in sixth with a value of 18.
Results of the Italian League Week 11 Rome 2-1 Napoli Napoli 1-2 InterTorino 0-1 Juventus.
